name: Razeth's Volition
flavorText: If one did not fear Razeth, one feared the dark powers of his minions.
flavorTextHtml: If one did not fear Razeth, one feared the dark powers of his minions.

primary.textHtml: Reduces all resource costs by [5.0 - 8.0]%.

secondary.textHtml: Skeletal Mage gains the effect of the Gift of Death and Singularity runes. You gain 39% damage reduction if your Essence is not full. (Necromancer Only) [35 - 50]%
